data.what_is: Ascent360 is a Data Driven Marketing Automation Platform that gives you a 360-degree view of your customers and enables you to accelerate your sales and maximize customer retention through cleansed data, segmented audiences and personalized, automated campaigns. It's never been easier to turn your customer data into sales.
data.product_description: Ascent360 provides cloud-based software that enables highly targeted, multi-channel communications direct to prospects and customers.

pricing_plans.plan_description: For companies actively growing their business, the Flash360 Basic version of the Ascent360 Marketing Automation Platform is a great starter package. With prices starting at just $10 a month, this plan includes an email send volume of 10x the number of e-mailable contacts in your database.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great and affordable mid range solution for all of our CDP/Marketing management needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ascent360?
As an omnichannel business, managing customer interactions and data has become easier with Ascent 360.  I especially love the ability to easily create email templates, deploy email workflows, and segment our customers. We can safely say it has made a massive difference in our relationships with our customers and has helped us adapt to the growing shift in our online business. The support staff are highly efficient and promptly address our needs and requests.

What do you dislike about Ascent360?
The audience selector can be a bit complex initially, but the segmentation opportunities are endless once you've spent time on the platform. We do wish there were more out-of-the-box integrations with other platforms and the ability to customize reporting dashboards.

What problems is Ascent360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an omnichannel business, managing all of our customer data and marketing efforts under a singular platform has become easier with Ascent 360.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ascent360 is a great platform for marketing and data
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ascent360?
Ascent360 does a great job of managing our content and data. We can communicate with our guests quickly and clearly by using the info they collect. The reps we work with are fantastic and help us develop new marketing ideas and strategies. I would recommend them to others looking for a new platform for marketing.

What do you dislike about Ascent360?
I don't have any downsides to working with the Ascent360 team.

What problems is Ascent360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ascent360 is helping us find new customers while still communicating with our current ones. Our company is more productive thanks to their data collection. We love seeing our number of contacts increase because of working with them.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ascent360?
Customer service and portfolio management is high-quality and on top of all requests. Once training was completed, CDP was fairly user-friendly.

What do you dislike about Ascent360?
Some navigational issues, data integration takes some time, automatic customer data output is not instantaneous. Auto-output has some hiccups. Does not work well with Social Media marketing, main use is for email marketing, could also be useful for mailings.

Recommendations to others considering Ascent360:
Utilize customer service and go through as much training as possible, especially when there are new updates.

What problems is Ascent360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ascent organizes our customer data and helps us target specific audiences for specific marketing campaigns based on numerous amounts of data such as purchase date, customer location, etc. Very helpful for email marketing paired with MailChimp.
